And some of us are logical and read other material besides tribal religion.=
 Care to do any logical debates Im up for it. 

Frank your reference to "Mo=
dern" beliefs are wrong I assume you classify me as a newager. I think you =
may have a cool box, but please don't think that makes you an expert on tri=
bal religon versus Quantum physics.
=C2=A0
Personally I believe the god of =
the bible is a savage evil god who really is the devil...if he were real. D=
on't beieve me? Have you ever read the old testament? Did you know that ove=
r 400 virgin girls were given to the priests during one raid for slavery? H=
mmm, I wonder what those holy priests used so many little girls for?
=C2=A0=

Could you go into a town and murder all women and children (drive swords t=
hu them) and then take them outside and put them in a pile and burn them? D=
oes that sound like a loving god? The hebrews were wild savages that decima=
ted a town, commited atrocities worse than hitler all in the name of what a=
 self proclaimed Jealous god?
=C2=A0
stick to your box but please don't try=
 to save us from the anti-christ.....by the way, jesus was not a christian.=
 He was a jewish.
=C2=A0
Research Constantine, he was the gay emperor that =
killed his wife, brother and son and chose to put together the books of the=
 new testament. He required that all believe and follow this religion or be=
 put to death. 
=C2=A0
Im just saying that this group is about EVP not abou=
t snowfire saving our sould from the debil.

oups .com

=
=C2=A0 




=C2=A0Easy to claim one is all modern and sophisticated, that a=
ll is known, there are no demons, gods,or angels. Easy to forget, modern ma=
n doesn't know squat! All your science, all your universities, all your "lo=
gic"--nothing! Y'all don't know anythin'!
=C2=A0
=C2=A0Awhile back=C2=A0I h=
ad an experience where=C2=A0I was awakened in the middle of the night to wh=
at seemed to be=C2=A0some entity crawling up inside my body starting at my =
feet, accompanied by weird visions/hallucinati ons, unable to move. Easy to=
 dismiss as dreams, maybe a bit of undigested beef-to quote scrooge, but no=
ne of my usual protection stuff worked, till I thought "Jesus!" The thing l=
ifted it's head and took off. I'm still not a believer, but I'm not a total=
 rejector either. There has been times when I needed "His" help, and was an=
swered, plus, what I guess were angels, in open air "Frank, He heard you". =
I don't believe in the church crap, but God is out there!=C2=A0 Not only th=
at, is been ":scientifically" -as close to -proven as possible-- that the S=
houd of Turin is in fact waht it appears to be--Jesus! Same question, what =
the hell kind of evidence will you find acceptable?
=C2=A0
=C2=A0Some here =
will still insist all is known, and they are in fact the most advanced bein=
g the universe has ever seen--they have a great deal to learn! I try to tol=
erate their arrogance, but my patience is gone for that stuff. When they ge=
t over their name calling, maybe they will be allowed to post. 
=C2=A0
=C2=
=A0Frank-S


On Wed, Jun 9, 2010 at 9:31 AM, Buck <shgiruss@yahoo. com> wro=
te:


=C2=A0 







Snowfire, if i was dead (passed on) and was able to by=
 happenstance come across you and the evp device and you asked me the quest=
ion, what makes you think I know what I am talking about? Because I would t=
ell you that their is no antichrist, no devil, no anthropomorphic hebrew sa=
vage god who commands his people to murder children and women in one town a=
nd in the next town kill all but virgin girls (old testament). 

I would sa=
y that there is only consciousness, not confined to any man made religion.
=

with love,
Russ
